description.value:
Element air; Type utility (Sp); Level 8; Burn 0

By focusing on your connection to air and seeding the air around you for 10 minutes, you can create powerful weather effects, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.578t0lra5ll3aifs]{Control Weather}. You can create tornadoes or hurricane-force winds, as appropriate for the season.

If you have access to the fire element, you can create hot weather, a heat wave, a thaw, or an early spring.

If you have access to the water element, you can create all other types of weather listed in control weather.
